reviewText: A fine DVD from TV's 'Lifetime' channel offers teens and adults extraordinary insights and personal perspectives, and is a recommended pick for any lending library. GIRL, POSITIVE tells of a teen who is shocked to find her boyfriend may be HIV positive. Rachel's had unprotected sex with him and she herself is at risk in this moving story, highly recommended for any library catering to teens.
summary: A moving story, highly recommended for any library catering to teens

reviewText: I have chills just watching this again on lifetime,with my friend over and we both say the ending will shake up anyone.Very real,raw,and should be seen as much as feasible for all teens.everyone actually but definitely the kids.I think the last part,the very ending was the BEST PART Of Girl,Positive,starring Jenny Garth ex kelly from fame show beverly hills 90210,few good lifetime movies.she is a great actress overall in my consensus,and always uniquely convincing.I will not spoil this too much just to say,price is fair,so BUY IT!Burn it,or whatever,but WATCH GIRL,POSITIVE.I  know my daughter will as a teen,because it is a realistic movie,all kids should see it.Definitely.I am for the fourth/five time since it aired in eithier 08 or so few years ago.I usually catch it on lifetime,not regular lifetime,the LMN channel,Love this movie...YOUR GOING TO HAVE TO CONTINUE NO MATTER WHAT TO USE PROTECTION DEFINITELY.I think overall the movie is 1 that should be shown to each teenager,walking the face of this earth.As it truly depict just what can happen to teenage,kids etc. when your not careful,and sleeping around,way too soon,and or at all.The Best way to protect self is Abstinence, any age or be celibate,Such a very interesting,incredibly educating but yet very sad fact-based movie.Very Sad movie,really is but it is SO good.So true to life...Hence i give as i do ALL true movie stories,or stories like this based on reality,statistic of such fact,i give ten stars easy.Adios.BMWREDHEADLAWSTUDENT@Gmail.comSha-Kaarii Bella Melendez
summary: Not Going to Spoil Girl,Positive but a movie that is SO good from 1st minute,to the INCREDIBLE SCARY,BUT TRUTHFUL ENDING........

reviewText: Seventeen-year-old Rachel Sandler (Andrea Bowen) is shocked out of her carefree world when word spreads through her upper-middle class community that Jason, a popular athlete who recently died, was an IV drug user, but it s a mysterious computer message that really hits home: Jason, who Rachel had unprotected sex with, may have been HIV positive.Wanting to learn more about HIV, Rachel is urged to visit the local AIDS clinic by her new substitute teacher, Sarah Bennet (Jennie Garth (90210). While there, Rachel takes a rapid AIDS test, but panics and leaves before learning the results.When Sarah discovers Rachel s test is positive, she breaks the shocking news to her, later revealing to Rachel that she herself has secretly been living with HIV for more than seven years. While both women wish to keep their privacy, they soon find out that with today s technology of instant messaging, cell phones and blogs, gossip--just like the disease--can spread fast and furiously.
Title: N/A
